<ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/AbackgroundColor" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- AppBar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:background="@color/AbackgroundColor">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/backButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_revert" android:contentDescription="Back" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="@android:color/black" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Rezepte hinzufügen" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Rezept Titel" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputRecipeTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Rezept Titel" android:inputType="text" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<!-- Image Picker --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/buttonUploadImage" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="100dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/dashed_line_background" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_camera" android:contentDescription="Upload Image" app:tint="@color/AcardTextColor" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Bild hochladen" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Description --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Beschreibung" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Beschreibung" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:lines="4" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<!-- Ingredients --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Zutaten" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/ingredientsRecyclerView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="150dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputNewIngredient" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Zutaten hinzufügen" android:inputType="text" android:imeOptions="actionDone" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<!-- Instructions --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Zubereitung" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/instructionsRecyclerView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="150dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputNewInstruction" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Schritt hinzufügen" android:inputType="text" android:imeOptions="actionDone" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<!-- Servings --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Portionen" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputServings" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Portionen" android:inputType="number" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<!-- Prep Time --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Zubereitungszeit" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputPrepHours" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Stunden" android:inputType="number" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputPrepMinutes" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Minuten" android:inputType="number" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Notes --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Notes" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputNotes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Notizen (Optional)" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:lines="3" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_background" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@color/AcardTextColor" android:textColorHint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<!-- Add Recipe Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonAddRecipe" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Rezept hinzufügen" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/AprimaryColor" android:textColor="@android:color/white" /> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

Etwa zwei Drittel für Boden und Rand abnehmen, daraus eine Kugel formen und diese etwas größer als Backformgröße ausrollen.", "Ofen auf 180 Grad Ober- und Unterhitze vorheizen", "Äpfel schälen, putzen, in Würfel schneiden. Restliche Streusel drüber geben.", "Kuchen ca. 55 Minuten backen, eventuell gegen Ende abdecken, damit er nicht zu dunkel wird." ], "image": "images/5_Apfel-Streusel_Kuchen.jpg", "servings": 10, "prepTime": "1:30", "notes": "" }, { "id": 6, "name": "Kartoffelgratin mit Blumenkohl", "description": "Ein herzafter Auflauf mit Kartoffeln und Blumenkohl.", "ingredients": [ "Kartoffeln", "Blumenkohl", "Zwiebel", "Knoblauch", "Sahne", "Käse" ], "preparations": [ "Blumenkohl in Röschen teilen und in Salzwasser blanchieren", "Kartoffeln in feine Scheiben schneiden und in eine Auflaufform schichten", "Zwiebel und Knoblauch anbraten und mit der Sahne leicht aufkochen lassen", "Die Sahne über die Kartoffeln gießen und mit Käse bestreuen", "Im Ofen bei 180 Grad ca. 45 Minuten backen, bis die Kartoffeln gar sind" ], "image": "images/6_Kartoffelgratin_mit_Blumenkohl.jpg", "servings": 6, "prepTime": "1:30", "notes": "" }, { "id": 7, "name": "Erdbeerkuchen mit Vanillepudding", "description": "Ein fruchtiger und weicher Kuchen mit Erdbeeren und Vanillepudding.", "ingredients": [ "Mehl", "Eier", "Zucker", "Salz", "Butter", "Backpulver", "Milch", "Vanillepuddingpulver", "Erdbeeren" ], "preparations": [ "Den Backofen auf 175° Grad Ober-/Unterhitze vorheizen und die Backform sorgfältig mit Butter einfetten. <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/recipe_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_foreground" android:contentDescription="Rezeptbild" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/close_button" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="start|top" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_close_clear_cancel" android:contentDescription="Schließen" android:padding="8dp" android:alpha="0.7" /> </FrameLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:text="Rezepttitel" android:padding="8dp" android:gravity="center" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_horizontal" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_prep_time" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Zubereitung: 15m" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_cook_time" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Kochzeit: 15m" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_total_time" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Gesamt: 30m" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Schnell, einfach & so gut, dass man sie echt jeden Tag essen könnte!" android:padding="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_horizontal" android:padding="8dp">
<Button android:id="@+id/ingredients_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Zutaten" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/instructions_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Anleitung" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/nutrition_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nährwerte" />
</LinearLayout>
<FrameLayout android:id="@+id/content_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_notes_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Notizen" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/recipe_notes_content" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Rezeptnotizen" android:padding="16dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
